title: Verify widget titled "Addendum C's" with only column called "Player" that shows Last name, Roster name
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps: WHEN we view the Addendum C's widget
custom_expected:
THEN we will see a column called "player"
AND column is populated with players Last Name, Roster Name

title: Verify that column is filterable using quick type
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is signed on as a club
AND can view the Addendum C Widget
custom_steps:
WHEN we click on the "Filter" icon
AND quick type in a players last name
custom_expected: THEN the widget will filter to show results we searched for

title: Verify that depending on the club that you log in as, you should only see your org's players
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum C's widget
custom_steps:
WHEN we view the widget
AND use filter on header to view through ORG/CLUBS
custom_expected:
THEN we should only be able to view players in our ORG
AND we do not have access to any other ORG's players
AND we can view players in other CLUBs within our ORG

title: Verify All read-only global widget capabilities must be present - maximize, minimize, refresh, export, quick filter
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is signed on as a club
AND can view the Addendum C Widget
custom_steps:
WHEN we view the widget
AND user clicks gear
AND user clicks refresh
AND user clicks export
AND user clicks maximize 
AND user clicks minimize
custom_expected:
THEN gear shows options of refresh,export
AND widget refreshes
AND widget data is exported
AND widget Maximizes
AND widget Minimizes

title: Verify the populations for this column:
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum C's widget
custom_steps: WHEN User checks the roster status of players
custom_expected:
THEN User should have one of the following statuses:
Active
Pending Active (will  appear in green)
Suspended by League / BOC
7 day DL
Rehab 7 day DL
Temporarily Inactive
60 Day DL
Rehab 60 Day DL
Reinstated from IL (Not Active)
Suspended by Club

title: Verify Wireframe
custom_steps:
http://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=club_-_view_add_cs

Open up the wireframe link
custom_expected: Addendum C matches the wireframe

title: Verify that the following columns exist on the Addendum C widget
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps: WHEN user checks the Addendum C Widget columns
custom_expected:
THEN user see's the following columns:
-- Status (Addendum C status)
-- Club (Mnr lg club name)
-- Date Signed
-- *Level of Play* - There is a separate column for each level of play that Org currently has. You should not see levels of play not part of that Org
-- Country Signed 
-- State Signed 
-- City Signed

title: Verify that if addendum C does not exist, only Player name and Club are populated
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps: WHEN Player does not have a addendum C
custom_expected: THEN Player only has their Name and Club populated

title: Verify that "Default to follow year for new Add C" system date is staying at current calendar year
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND user is logged in as System Admin on separate browser
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps: WHEN User sets "Default to following year for New Add C" is set after current date
custom_expected: THEN System sets Addendum C widget to current year's Addendum C's

title: Verify that "Default to following year for new Add C" system date is flipping to next calendar year
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club 
AND user is logged in as System Admin on separate browser
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps: WHEN User sets "Default to following year for new Add C" to before current date
custom_expected: THEN System flips the Addendum C widget to the next calendar year's Addendum C

title: Verify that the Addendum C's are color coded based on the status of the Addenudm C
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps: WHEN User checks a different addendum c statuses
custom_expected:
THEN Every status has it's own color code based which are:
--Missing (i.e blank) - Red
--Preliminary - Red
--Tendered - Green
--Pending - Green
--Update - Green
--Approved - Black

title: Verify that large numbers are displayed with commas
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps: When User adds a numeral number greater than three numbers
custom_expected:
THEN comma is added per three numbers. 
EX:1,000

title: Verify there is a header filter for club
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps:
WHEN User checks header of addendum C widget 
AND expands club dropdown
custom_expected:
THEN Club filter shows all clubs
AND when clicked, Addendum C is filtered to whatever club is selected

title: Verify there is a header filter for Status
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps:
WHEN User checks header of addendum C widget
AND expands status dropdown
custom_expected:
THEN Status filter shows all Statuses
AND when clicked, Addendum C is filtered to whatever status is selected

title: Verify that the Player Name is a frozen column
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps: WHEN User clicks edit on Addendum C widget
custom_expected: THEN Player Name column remains in view only mode.

title: Verify wireframe
custom_preconds: http://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=club_-_view_add_cs
custom_steps:
Open up wireframe link
Cross check wireframe and ebis
custom_expected: Wireframe matches with ebis

title: Verify edit icon is only available for rows that can be edited
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Add C widget
AND has located a player whose Add C status is preliminary OR does not have an Add C for this year
custom_steps: WHEN I click Edit Icon
custom_expected: THEN the selected row becomes editable

title: Verify Edit icon must be frozen and on the left
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as club
custom_steps: When I view the Add C Widget
custom_expected:
THEN the Edit icon must be on the left of other columns
AND the edit icon must be frozen
AND the player column is frozen

title: Verify only certain columns are editable
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Add C widget
custom_steps: WHEN I view the Add C widget
custom_expected:
THEN I can see that only the Date Signed, Level of Play columns and location signed columns are editable
AND Player name, club and status remain non-editable.

title: Verify Date Signed field is a date picker
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Add C widget
custom_steps: WHEN I view the date signed field
custom_expected:
THEN I can see that the date signed field is a date picker
AND it has no default value

title: Verify Level of Play column accepts only numerical values
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Add C widget
custom_steps: WHEN I view the Level of Play columns
custom_expected:
THEN I can see that these fields must only accept numerical values
AND the fields should NOT accept alpha numeric values
AND entering a number and clicking out of the field, system should inset commas as appropriate

title: Verify country signed column should be a search dropdown
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is signed on as a club
AND can view the Add C widget
custom_steps: WHEN I view the Country Signed column
custom_expected:
THEN I should see that this is a search dropdown of countries
AND it should default to USA

title: Verify state dropdown is a search dropdown
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Add C widget
custom_steps:
WHEN I view the State Signed field
AND the city signed field
custom_expected:
THEN I can see that state signed field is a search dropdown
AND if country is NOT set to USA, then state field is disabled
AND the city signed field is a free type field

title: Clicking the edit icon on a row will place focus in the first editable field within that row
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as club
AND can view the Add C widget
custom_steps: WHEN I click on the Edit Icon for an individual row
custom_expected: THEN the focus will be in the first editable field in that row

title: Verify clicking cancel on an individual row erases any changes made
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view Add C widget
custom_steps:
WHEN I click EDIT on an individual row
AND make changes to the fields in that row
AND I click the Cancel button
custom_expected: THEN any changes I made to that row will be erased

title: Verify edit mode matches wireframe color and border
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the ADD C widget
custom_steps: WHEN I click EDIT button on an indiviual row
custom_expected: THEN edit mode UI should match the wireframe here [LINK to WF]

title: Verify user can edit other rows while leaving a previously edited row in edit mode
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Add C widget
custom_steps:
WHEN I click Edit on an individual row
AND I click Edit on another row
custom_expected:
THEN both rows will be in edit mode
AND I can independently edit/cancel one while leaving the other in EDIT mode

title: Once a row becomes editable, show action button Save on bottom of widget
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum C Widget
custom_steps: WHEN User clicks edit button
custom_expected: THEN Save button on bottom of footer widget should be enabled

title: Verify changes made get saved and widget returns to view mode
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum C Widget
custom_steps:
WHEN User clicks edit button
AND Enters all required fields
AND Clicks Save
custom_expected: THEN All rows in edit mode should return to view mode

title: When data is saved without an Add C, a preliminary Add C is created
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps:
WHEN User clicks edit on a not created addendum C player
AND adds salaries for levels of play
AND Clicks Save
custom_expected: THEN Addendum C status should switch from Not Created to Preliminary

title: Verify when all rows in edit mode are individually canceled out, widget returns to view mode and save disapears
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps:
WHEN User makes multiple rows into edit mode 
AND individually cancels them all
custom_expected: THEN Save becomes disabled and rows become view mode

title: Verify that the Cancel All Changes button is only visible if there is at least one row currently in edit mode in the table.
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps:
WHEN User clicks Edit on multiple rows
AND Clicks "Cancel All Changes" on a most of the rows
custom_expected: THEN The rows that "Cancel All Changes" was not clicked on remain in EDIT Mode.

title: Verify that Selecting all of the rows will automatically select all of the rows currently contained in the widget, whether or not they are immediately visible.
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps: WHEN User selects the checkbox to select all rows
custom_expected: THEN All rows are checked and selected on the widget

title: Verify that Selecting all of the rows will not select any rows that have been filtered from the view.
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps:
WHEN User uses filter to narrow down the choices
AND Clicks Select All Rows checkbox
custom_expected: THEN All the filtered results will be selected. (All results that were removed from the widget from the filter are not selected)

title: Verify that Deselecting all of the rows will automatically deselect all of the rows contained in the widget.
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps:
WHEN User clicks the select all checkbox
AND User selects "select all" checkbox again
custom_expected: THEN All rows are de-selected and no rows are selected in the widget

title: Verify that a new preliminary Addendum C on the multi-C widget, the system should pre-populate country,state and city
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps: WHEN User creates a new preliminary Addendum C
custom_expected: THEN System should auto populate Country,State,and City forms.

title: They must be pre-populated with the selected Org's spring training location.
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps: WHEN Creating a preliminary addendum C on the multi-addendum C widget
custom_expected: THEN The org's spring training location is prepopulated

title: A user should be able to change the default values at any time when this field is editable.
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps: WHEN User creates a new preliminary addendum c in the addendum C widget
custom_expected: THEN Country, State, and City are editable from default values

title: Verify that the tender button is only available when no rows are in edit mode
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps:
WHEN User clicks edit on a addendum C
AND Clicks the checkbox on another preliminary addendum C
custom_expected: THEN User should only see save until edit mode is completely off for all addendum Cs

title: Verify that when no checkboxes are selected, tender button is disabled
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps:
WHEN User looks at addendum C
AND Does not select any checkboxes
custom_expected: THEN Tender button should be disabled

title: As you select 1 or more rows of preliminary, the Tender button should be enabled
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps: WHEN User selects more than 1 preliminary row
custom_expected: THEN Tender button should be enabled

title: Using the tender button on selected rows updates those to "tendered"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps:
WHEN User clicks edit on a preliminary addendum C's
AND Fufills all required fields with no errors
AND Clicks Tender
custom_expected: THEN Addendum C's moves from Preliminary to Tendered

title: Verify that the 'Enter Salary' button is visible on the Addendum C widget at all times.
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps: WHEN User searches for Enter Salary button
custom_expected: THEN Enter Salary Button is visible to user at all times on Addendum C widget

title: Verify When no checkboxes are selected, the button is disabled
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps:
WHEN User searches for Enter Salary button
AND does not click any checkboxes
custom_expected: THEN Enter Salary button is disabled

title: Verify As you select one or more rows that have a status of 'Preliminary,' or 'Not created', the 'Enter Salary' button is enabled.
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps: WHEN User selects multiple checkboxes on the addendum C widget
custom_expected: THEN Enter Salary Button is enabled

title: Verify When the 'Enter Salary' button is clicked, a pop-out containing a text box for entering a single salary value will appear.
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps:
WHEN User Selects a checkbox on a preliminary or not created addendum C
AND User selects Enter Salary Button
custom_expected: THEN A pop-out containing textbox for entering a single salary value will appear.

title: Verify When the user enters a salary into the text box and clicks 'Apply,' the entered salary will be used as the salary value for all Levels of Play for all selected rows and the popout will close.
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps:
WHEN User Checks a Checkbox on a preliminary,tendered,Update,or Not created Addendum C
AND User clicks Enter Salary button
AND Clicks Apply
custom_expected: THEN All levels of play for that row are filled out with the single salary value

title: Verify Affected rows will be put into edit mode (if not already in edit mode), and the user must click the 'Save' button for changes to be committed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
AND User Checks a Checkbox on a preliminary,tendered,Update,or Not created Addendum C
AND User clicks Enter Salary button
AND Clicks Apply
custom_steps: WHEN User clicks Save
custom_expected: THEN All changes will be committed and saved.

title: Verify the correct columns
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps: WHEN User checks columns on the addendum c widget
custom_expected:
THEN these columns should be present:
-- Status (Addendum C status)
-- Club (Mnr lg club name)
-- Date Signed
-- *Level of Play* - There is a separate column for each level of play  
-- Country Signed 
-- State Signed 
-- City Signed

title: If there is no Add C, show only player and club names columns
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps: WHEN User looks at player with no addendum c
custom_expected:
THEN User see's only the player's name and club that player is in

* State/Country/City Signed are also available to be seen.

title: Widget should use the correct system dates
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps:
WHEN User logins into system admin on another browser
AND Looks at addendum C system dates
AND Changes them 
AND refreshes addendum C widget
custom_expected: THEN User should see addendum C changing based on years on system admin.

title: Row color should be based off status of Add C
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps: WHEN User checks the color codes of each row
custom_expected:
THEN Each color should be based on the status of the addendum C.

--Missing (i.e blank) - Red
--Preliminary - Red
--Tendered - Green
--Pending - Green
--Update - Green
--Approved - Black

title: Large #s should be displayed with Comma
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps: WHEN User puts down a number greater than 3 numbers
custom_expected: THEN The number should include a comma for every fourth number. (EX.1,000)

title: There should be a dropdown header filter for Club column
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps: WHEN User clicks club dropdown on the header of Add C
custom_expected: THEN User should see a list of clubs for that org in the dropdown

title: The Club filter should be ordered according to level of Play
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps: WHEN User checks level of play in club filter
custom_expected:
THEN Clubs should be in highest level of play to lowest

*Can be found online

title: There should be a header filter for status column
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps: WHEN User checks header
custom_expected: THEN Status filter should be there on the top of the header.

title: Verify the status filters order
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps:
WHEN User finds status filter in header
AND Clicks status dropdown
custom_expected:
THEN Status dropdown should follow
--Preliminary
--Preliminary/Not Created
--Tendered 
--Pending 
--Update
--Approved

title: Player name column must be frozen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps: WHEN User clicks edit
custom_expected:
THEN Name of player is un-editable

(Players name should always be frozen)

title: Verify scenario in which system date is not populated
custom_preconds: GIVEN the system date does not populate to "default to following year for new Add C"
custom_steps: WHEN the user is on the Add C widget
custom_expected: THEN the widget shows Add C's for current calendar year
